nodes.text: Subtext Mining Corporate Headquarters was a building on the planet of Corellia. It was the headquarters for the company Subtext Mining. After marooning several Subtext mining executives in the Tingel Arm for a year, Darth Plagueis ordered for them to be killed and their bodies dumped in front of the Subtext Mining Headquarters for their role in selling a sabotaged M-2 mining probe droid to Plagueis and his Sith Master Darth Tenebrous.
